name: ban
description: Ban a member from the server

options.name: member
options.description: The member you want to ban

options.name: timespan
options.description: The optional timespan to ban them for (let [x] be any number: [x]s, [x]m, [x]h, [x]d, [x]y)

options.name: reason
options.description: The reason why the member is being banned (defaults to "Not kool enough to stay in Skripthut")

options.name: messages
options.description: The amount of days ago to delete their messages
